title: RELENTLESS X-TREME BREED logo
content:
Hi Friends

Please help me ID the font used for RELENTLESS X-TREME BREED logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110608142004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/relentless_6147.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
"elentless" is Fette Fraktur (minus the little hair on the l)

The R is a separate font..

Ok thanks... what about the R, from where is the R ?

somebody can help me please

Thanks in advance

Hernando

The R is from some Old English. Closest I could find is this shaded [Archive Copperplate Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20110608142004/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-copperplate-text/).
